comment._content: "Lute Joseph Boone (May 6, 1890 to July 29, 1982), was a Major League Baseball infielder who played from 1913 to 1916 with the New York Yankees and in 1918 with the Pittsburgh Pirates. " en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lute_Boone His obituary: jamiedanker.com/deaths/Obit-LuteBoone.jpg
